abstract: Carl C. Icahn says a stock repurchase is preferable to a possible sale of WebMD, although he acknowledges he does not know of any efforts to put the online health site on the auction block.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn says a stock repurchase is preferable to a possible sale of WebMD, although he acknowledges he does not know of any efforts to put the online health site on the auction block.
lead_paragraph: Ready or not, WebMD, here comes Carl C. Icahn.

headline.main: Icahn Urges WebMD to Buy Back $1 Billion in Stock
